com.xm.ui.widget

类 CircularProgressView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.xm.ui.widget.CircularProgressView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class CircularProgressView
extends android.view.View
    自定义控件参数说明：
    • cpv_progress：加载条最小进度，默认0
    • cpv_maxProgress：加载条最大进度，默认为100
    • cpv_animDuration：动画时长，默认为4000
    • cpv_animSwoopDuration：设置持续时间，默认为5000
    • cpv_animSyncDuration：设置持续时间，默认为500
    • cpv_color：加载条颜色，默认为#2196F3
    • cpv_thickness：宽度，默认为4dp
    • cpv_indeterminate:动画模式，默认为false
    • cpv_animAutostart:是否自动开始，默认为false
    • cpv_animSteps:动画叠加个数，默认为3
    作者:

    • 方法详细资料

      • isIndeterminate

        public boolean isIndeterminate()
        Returns the mode of this view (determinate or indeterminate).
        返回:
        true if this view is in indeterminate mode.

      • setIndeterminate

        public void setIndeterminate(boolean isIndeterminate)
        Sets whether this CircularProgressView is indeterminate or not. It will reset the animation if the mode has changed.
        参数:
        isIndeterminate - True if indeterminate.

      • getThickness

        public int getThickness()
        Get the thickness of the progress bar arc.
        返回:
        the thickness of the progress bar arc

      • setThickness

        public void setThickness(int thickness)
        Sets the thickness of the progress bar arc.
        参数:
        thickness - the thickness of the progress bar arc

      • getColor

        public int getColor()
        返回:
        the color of the progress bar

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int color)
        Sets the color of the progress bar.
        参数:
        color - the color of the progress bar

      • getMaxProgress

        public float getMaxProgress()
        Gets the progress value considered to be 100% of the progress bar.
        返回:
        the maximum progress

      • setMaxProgress

        public void setMaxProgress(float maxProgress)
        Sets the progress value considered to be 100% of the progress bar.
        参数:
        maxProgress - the maximum progress

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
        返回:
        current progress

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(float currentProgress)
        Sets the progress of the progress bar.
        参数:
        currentProgress - the new progress.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(CircularProgressViewListener listener)
        Register a CircularProgressViewListener with this View
        参数:
        listener - The listener to register

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(CircularProgressViewListener listener)
        Unregister a CircularProgressViewListener with this View
        参数:
        listener - The listener to unregister

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation()
        Starts the progress bar animation. (This is an alias of resetAnimation() so it does the same thing.)

      • resetAnimation

        public void resetAnimation()
        Resets the animation.
